tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE contactless_payment_terminals (
    terminal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    latitude DECIMAL(10, 8),
    longitude DECIMAL(11, 8),
    maintenance_due_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE terminals_usage (
    usage_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    terminal_id INT,
    usage_date DATE,
    transaction_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    FOREIGN KEY (terminal_id) REFERENCES contactless_payment_terminals(terminal_id)
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    terminal_id INT,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    maintenance_notes TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (terminal_id) REFERENCES contactless_payment_terminals(terminal_id)
);

CREATE TABLE terminal_location_tracking (
    tracking_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    terminal_id INT,
    tracking_date DATETIME,
    latitude DECIMAL(10,6),
    longitude DECIMAL(10,6)
);

CREATE TABLE terminal_tracking (
  tracking_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  terminal_id UUID NOT NULL,
  tracking_date DATE NOT NULL,
  longitude DECIMAL NOT NULL,
  latitude DECIMAL NOT NULL
);
